name: Phyllida Law
role: Actress, Writer, Costume and Wardrobe Department
summary: Phyllida Law. Actress: The Time Machine. Phyllida Law was born on 8 May 1932 in Glasgow, Scotland, UK. She is an actress and writer, known for The Time Machine (2002), Much Ado About Nothing (1993) and The Winter Guest (1997). She was previously married to Eric Thompson.
